MAY 16 1962
Mc- 3694
General Services Administration/FS8 Region 6 Kansas City 81, Missouri U. S. A.
Subject: Excess Property
Gentlemen, Wie have requirement for one Crane, Bulletin No. 62, Page 5, Control No. 6-62-4453, Itom 1, Condition -2. Please advise availability. If your reply is in the affirmative we will immediately forward our purchase order.
Sincerely yours,
H. T. Potter Supply Advisor
Cho/ml 5/10/62
cc: P/SP (2) X/CAR (2) PO ID-Carter CUSA 2nd Div.
